title: PURA
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar
description: Cocina saludable. Simple restaurant and shop in a house that is also a yoga center. Serves mostly lunch and tea. An organic garden is on the premises. Menu is vegan except for honey. Try the raw foods and desserts. Hosts vegan cooking classes. The store area sells packaged teas, seeds, oils, and crackers along with books and yoga mats. Jan 2016 reported no more dinner or shows.
streetAddress: Primera Junta 1029 Bajo de San Isidro
